cdo -b F64 mergetime * test.nc
ncrename -v longitude,lon -v latitude,lat -v level,lev -d longitude,lon -d latitude,lat -d level,lev -v aermr04,DUST1 -v aermr05,DUST2 -v aermr06,DUST3 gasmet_201710.nc
ncatted -a typ,DUST1,c,c,dust -a typ,DUST2,c,c,dust -a typ,DUST3,c,c,dust gasmet_201710.nc
ncatted -a molarmass,DUST1,c,f,100 -a molarmass,DUST2,c,f,100 -a molarmass,DUST3,c,f,100 gasmet_201710.nc
ncatted -a units,DUST1,m,c,ppp -a units,DUST2,m,c,ppp -a units,DUST3,m,c,ppp gasmet_201710.nc
ncatted -a bin_low,DUST1,c,f,0.03 -a bin_low,DUST2,c,f,0.55 -a bin_low,DUST3,c,f,0.9 gasmet_201710.nc
ncatted -a bin_high,DUST1,c,f,0.55 -a bin_high,DUST2,c,f,0.9 -a bin_high,DUST3,c,f,20.0 gasmet_201710.nc

#in case refpres is an attribute of lev
#ncatted -a refpres,lev,c,f,'0.000000,20.000000,38.425343,63.647804,95.636963,134.483307,180.584351,234.779053,298.495789,373.971924,464.618134,575.651001,713.218079,883.660522,1094.834717,1356.474609,1680.640259,2082.273926,2579.888672,3196.421631,3960.291504,4906.708496,6018.019531,7306.631348,8765.053711,10376.126953,12077.446289,13775.325195,15379.805664,16819.474609,18045.183594,19027.695313,19755.109375,20222.205078,20429.863281,20384.480469,20097.402344,19584.330078,18864.750000,17961.357422,16899.468750,15706.447266,14411.124023,13043.218750,11632.758789,10209.500977,8802.356445,7438.803223,6144.314941,4941.778320,3850.913330,2887.696533,2063.779785,1385.912598,855.361755,467.333588,210.393890,65.889244,7.367743,0.000000,0.000000' gasmet_201710.nc

#in case refpres is a global attribute
ncatted -a refpres,global,c,f,'0.000000,20.000000,38.425343,63.647804,95.636963,134.483307,180.584351,234.779053,298.495789,373.971924,464.618134,575.651001,713.218079,883.660522,1094.834717,1356.474609,1680.640259,2082.273926,2579.888672,3196.421631,3960.291504,4906.708496,6018.019531,7306.631348,8765.053711,10376.126953,12077.446289,13775.325195,15379.805664,16819.474609,18045.183594,19027.695313,19755.109375,20222.205078,20429.863281,20384.480469,20097.402344,19584.330078,18864.750000,17961.357422,16899.468750,15706.447266,14411.124023,13043.218750,11632.758789,10209.500977,8802.356445,7438.803223,6144.314941,4941.778320,3850.913330,2887.696533,2063.779785,1385.912598,855.361755,467.333588,210.393890,65.889244,7.367743,0.000000,0.000000' gasmet_201710.nc
